Benefits.title: Business benefits for your company:
Benefits.increasedProductivity: Increase production efficiency â€“ produce the same amount in less time by minimizing micro-downtime and optimizing machine operations.
Benefits.fasterReaction: Faster problem response â€“ monitor machine status in real time and make more accurate business decisions.
Benefits.shorterCycle: Shorter production cycle â€“ use modules for scheduling, eliminating micro-downtime, and monitoring production efficiency.
Benefits.betterQuality: Improved product quality â€“ reduce production waste and customer complaints, which also improve client relations.
Benefits.dataAnalysis: Historical data analysis â€“ draw conclusions and optimize production processes based on historical data.
Benefits.fasterOnboarding: Faster onboarding of new employees â€“ shorten onboarding time through standardized monitoring of production processes.

Roi.title: Return on investment in MES â€“ how to calculate?
Roi.intro: Implementing an MES system is not just a step towards digital transformation â€“ it is an investment that can pay off quickly. To demonstrate this, the ROI (Return on Investment) indicator is used, showing what percentage of the costs incurred you will recover in the form of profits or savings.
Roi.formula: ROI = ( investment profit â€“ investment costs ) Ã· investment costs Ã— 100%
Roi.exampleTitle: Example ROI estimation for MES implementation:
Roi.exampleIntro: A Polish manufacturing company ABC is considering implementing an MES system in its production plant. The investment costs have been estimated as follows:
Roi.exampleList3: Communication gateways, HMI panels, PLC controllers
Roi.exampleList4: System configuration service and implementation costs
Roi.investmentCosts: Total investment costs: 140,000 PLN + 20,000 PLN for system maintenance in the first year, giving a total of 160,000 PLN.
Roi.effectsIntro: Thanks to MES, the company estimates:
Roi.effectsList1: Increase in efficiency by 15% (fewer micro-downtimes, shorter production cycle time)
Roi.effectsList2: Reduction of rejects by 13% (better quality control)
Roi.roiExplanation: An ROI of 0.25 means that the company will save 25% of the invested funds in the first year of using the system.
Roi.conclusion: MES is an investment that will not only increase the level of digitization of the factory but also bring real savings. Success depends on good plant preparation and the right choice of technology.

OmnimesInformation.subTitle: More profit, less waste.
OmnimesInformation.heading: is an innovative production execution system
OmnimesInformation.description: Monitors processes in real-time, allowing for continuous analysis and elimination of bottlenecks. With reliable information and increased efficiency, OmniMES revolutionizes production management, opening doors to new optimization possibilities.
OmnimesInformation.descriptionCard1: We will guide your manufacturing company through the process of digital transformation.
OmnimesInformation.descriptionCard2: We precisely identify what needs to be changed, adapted, or improved to make the system implementation as efficient as possible. This includes both technical aspects, such as machine integration, and organizational aspects.
OmnimesInformation.descriptionCard3: We will undertake the comprehensive preparation of the factory infrastructure, providing the necessary means for the effective implementation of digital solutions. Our goal is to create a solid foundation for modern production.
OmnimesInformation.descriptionCard4: A team of experts will carry out the effective implementation of the system, tailored to the results of the analysis. Together, we will unlock the potential of your production by introducing innovative technological solutions.

EnergyInfo.heading: Cut costs and boost energy efficiency!
EnergyInfo.description: OmniMES enables precise monitoring of electricity and other utilities across your production process.

card1.title: Optimize product cost
card1.body: Analyze energy usage per line and SKU to lower unit cost and plan production against tariffs and load.

card2.title: Identify energy losses
card2.body: Detect sources and events driving overconsumption: downtimes, startups, idle modes, and setup errors.

card3.title: Improve process efficiency
card3.body: Correlate energy data with production metrics (OEE, cycle times, work orders) to drive fact-based decisions.

iso.text: OmniMES helps meet ISO-50001 (energy management) and ISO-14001 (environmental management) goals.

CloudInfo.heading: Full control over OmniMES in just a few minutes
CloudInfo.tagline: OmniPlatform â€“ your place to manage OmniMES.
CloudInfo.subTitle: Fast start & simple setup
CloudInfo.p1: OmniPlatform is an intuitive web platform that lets you launch and configure OmniMES instances with ease. The entire process â€” including plan selection â€” typically takes 5â€“10 minutes.
CloudInfo.p2: Responding to strong interest in the system, we opened the platform to everyone. With a subscription you can get instant access to OmniMES and get started right away.
CloudInfo.p3: Gain freedom and convenience in infrastructure management: automation, fast deployments and full control â€” so you can focus on production, not servers.

Feature.Monitoring_desc: Absolute control over machine status, enabling immediate response to potential failures and effective tracking of production efficiency in real-time.
Feature.Creator: Intuitive configuration creator
Feature.Creator_desc: Exceptionally easy customization of system settings through an intuitive configuration creator, allowing flexible adaptation of the system to individual needs and production specifications.
Feature.Analyse: Rapid event analysis on the production line
Feature.Analyse_desc: Immediate analysis of events on the production line, identifying potential issues and reducing reaction time, securing the smooth flow of production processes.
Feature.Schedule_desc: Flexible production planning through schedule creation functionality, enabling optimal resource utilization and adapting production to changing conditions.
Feature.Pulpits: Creation of dynamically changing data analysis dashboards
Feature.Pulpits_desc: Building interactive dashboards with dynamically changing data analyses, allowing for instant assessment of production status and focus on key performance indicators.
Feature.Raports: Flexible report creation in the creator
Feature.Raports_desc: The report creator provides the ability to create flexible reports tailored to specific needs, facilitating the collection, analysis, and presentation of key production-related data.
Feature.title: Effective MES solutions for maximum control and production optimization
Feature.desc: Automated monitoring of production processes - gain full control and maximize efficiency of your production with innovative functionalities of the OmniMES System.

Time.heading: How much does an hour of downtime cost you? With
Time.heading_part2: we can significantly reduce this cost.
Time.text: Instant information allows for effective identification of faulty elements in the machinery park, not only minimizing the time required for repairs but also reducing micro downtimes that can impact overall production efficiency. As a result, your company can operate more efficiently, saving both time and costs associated with machine downtime.

Team.company: Automation of a business is a complex process that requires specialized knowledge and reliable suppliers. That is why the company MultiProjekt has set a goal to support Polish companies in industrial automation at every stage. MultiProjekt is a proven supplier of automation components and machine parts with 20 years of experience. However, what characterizes us the most is professional consulting and an individual approach to the customer.
Team.descriptionCompany: Thanks to years of experience in automation, the company MultiProjekt has created a proprietary program called OmniMES. This software not only reacts but also predicts changes in the industry. It's a promise of improved efficiency, higher quality, and predictability of manufacturing processes.
Team.descriptionTeam: We are a cohesive team that combines our skills and enthusiasm to deliver high-quality software to our clients. Each member of our team is an expert in their field, possessing rich experience and constantly evolving in their profession.

Opinion.opinion1: OmniMES is a revolution in our production process! Thanks to this system, we have gained not only full control over production but also achieved new levels of efficiency. This tool is essential for any company that wants to raise its standards and achieve operational excellence.
Opinion.opinion2: The experience with the OmniMES team was extremely professional. From the first contact to the full implementation of the system, we felt supported by competent and friendly experts. Their commitment to our success truly stands out among other service providers.
Opinion.opinion3: As a rapidly growing company, we appreciate the flexibility and scalability offered by OmniMES. The system adapts perfectly to our growing needs, allowing us to maintain competitiveness in the market. It is a key element of our success.
Opinion.opinion4: OmniMES not only provides real-time data but also equips us with analytical tools that allow us to predict future trends. This is undoubtedly a competitive advantage that enables us to make strategic decisions with a full understanding of the market.
Opinion.opinion5: The implementation of the OmniMES system went smoothly thanks to the dedication and professionalism of the implementation team. Every stage was carefully planned, and the specialists were always ready to answer our questions. It's a feeling of complete confidence that we are in good hands.
Opinion.opinion6: OmniMES is more than just a system - it's a modern approach to production. Thanks to this platform, we have revolutionized our processes, introducing innovations that have brought significant increases in efficiency. An indispensable tool for companies wishing to stay ahead of the competition.
Opinion.title: What are they saying about us?

Timeline.title1: Open the doors to innovation! Start a revolution in your factory with just one phone call.
Timeline.title2: Discover key tips for optimizing production in your factory.
Timeline.title3: Digitize your production today, for the benefit of efficiency and competitiveness of your factory.
Timeline.title4: Digital optimization of your production without additional costs
Timeline.title5: We provide full support and necessary knowledge to fully utilize the potential of our system
Timeline.description1: Initiate the process by calling us so we can understand your needs and plan the first step in transforming your factory.
Timeline.description2: Our experts come to your factory, conducting a comprehensive production audit. In just a few days, you will receive detailed results, including recommendations and potential optimization areas, enabling you to take a quick path to production excellence.
Timeline.description3: Whether your current infrastructure meets the requirements for MES implementation or requires certain adjustments, our company provides full support, helping to adapt your production to modern standards. From selecting the right components to providing technical advice, we will focus on modernizing your factory.
Timeline.description4: If your factory is ready for MES implementation, we will proceed with an individual service quotation. Our offer will include all necessary elements, providing you with transparency and clarity regarding costs. Whether you need basic implementation or a full custom package, we will tailor to your needs.
Timeline.description5: We provide free training for your team so that all employees can effectively use the new system. Our collaboration does not end there - we assist and update the system throughout your subscription period, ensuring continuous development and production excellence.
Timeline.textHeading: Take your production to a new level today
Timeline.textDesc: MES at your fingertips - with us through every stage of implementation

Performance.subtitle: Monitoring production efficiency
Performance.title: Automatically collect data from your machines
Performance.desc: The OmniMES system specializes in efficiently collecting data from various machines, regardless of their age or level of technological advancement. Its advanced module for machine communication is designed to provide secure and efficient communication.
Performance.heading: Achieving full control over the production process becomes possible thanks to advanced machine communication with the OmniMES system. The system facilitates integration with over 300 communication protocols of controllers and HMI panels.
Performance.s1: OmniMES displays production data in real-time.
Performance.desc1: This system not only collects data but also allows for real-time analysis, enabling quick responses to any issues or optimization of the production process. OmniMES establishes a solid foundation for efficient production, performance improvement, and minimizing potential failures.
Performance.alt1: Example communication protocols with the MES system
Performance.alt2: Production line with examples of signals sent by machines
Performance.heading2: Increase control over the production process
Performance.s2: The ability to monitor each machine individually and collectively in real-time provides detailed insight into the quality of your production.
Performance.desc2: With precise data collected from each machine, the system enables a precise understanding of the current production status. This allows for quick detection of potential issues, minimizing downtime, and optimizing the production process.
Performance.s3: Intuitive and clear display of production data saves your time on analysis.
Performance.desc3: Collecting and analyzing historical data is a crucial element in the process of production improvement. With the OmniMES system, gathering information regarding the production process occurs automatically and flawlessly. These data serve as valuable knowledge sources, allowing for trend tracking, pattern identification, and detection of any anomalies.

MonitoringPage.title: Real-Time Monitoring
MonitoringPage.subTitle: The Omnimes system sets new standards in the industry by utilizing the MQTT SparkPlug B protocol based on the advanced EMQX broker. This precisely selected technical specification opens doors for our clients to the world of monitoring, achieving unparalleled data transmission parameters.
MonitoringPage.p1: Key achievements of our system include:
MonitoringPage.l1: Data transmission latency below 1 ms, guaranteeing almost instant response to changes in the production process.
MonitoringPage.l2: Ability to handle individual data frames up to a maximum size of 256 MB, enabling the transmission of extensive information packets without loss of performance.
MonitoringPage.l3: Throughput scale from 1,000 to 1,000,000 signals per second, ensuring comprehensive monitoring of even the most complex production systems.
MonitoringPage.p2: The use of MQTT version SparkPlug B has allowed for the standardization of data structure, resulting in ease of system configuration. Each monitored element is represented through tags and values, facilitating management and quick adaptation to changing requirements of production processes.
MonitoringPage.p3: The Omnimes system monitoring is designed with flexibility and personalization in mind. Users have the ability to customize the interface appearance according to their own preferences and enterprise needs.
MonitoringPage.p4: Additionally, to meet enterprise expectations, we have implemented a special TV monitoring mode. It allows for convenient display of key information on large monitors, enabling efficient tracking of production processes from any location within the facility.
MonitoringPage.altLight: Photo depicting the Monitoring module in light theme
MonitoringPage.altDark: Photo depicting the Monitoring module in dark theme
MonitoringPage.altTV: Photo depicting the Monitoring module in TV mode

GPTPage.title: GPT Assistant System
GPTPage.subTitle: In today's times, as competition in the production market becomes increasingly fierce, it has become crucial to utilize the latest technologies to optimize production processes. A system supported by innovative AI solutions from OpenAI, utilizing the GPT assistant, represents a futuristic tool that enables not only monitoring but also significant improvement of every stage of production.
GPTPage.subTitle2: What does it involve? On the main panel, we visualize information in the form of charts regarding various aspects of the production process from a specific period. Such as pressure measurements from the last 24 hours from all machines/stations, juxtaposing it with the occurrence of failures and the quantity of produced items.
GPTPage.p1: The key added value of our system is the ability for one-click analysis of collected data. GPT Assistant, utilizing machine learning algorithms, analyzes operational data, extracting coherent insights. This allows for quick adaptation of production strategy, identification of areas for improvement, and increased overall process efficiency.
GPTPage.p2: This allows for quick adaptation of production strategy, identification of areas for improvement, and increased overall process efficiency.
GPTPage.p3: We understand that every production process is unique. Therefore, our system offers the possibility of personalizing the behavior of the AI assistant. You can specify which information is most important to you, and the system will adjust the way data is presented and analyzed to your individual needs. This flexibility ensures that you receive precisely the information that is most relevant to your enterprise.
GPTPage.p4: We have designed the interface of our MES system with maximum intuitiveness and simplicity of use in mind. Activation of the GPT assistant is possible by pressing a combination of three buttons: G + P + T. This makes system management quick and does not require advanced technical knowledge. The only requirement of our solution is to possess a GPT API token.
GPTPage.altLight: A photo showing the Dashboard module with a dynamic panel in light mode
GPTPage.altDark: A photo showing the Dashboard module with a dynamic panel in dark mode
GPTPage.altLight2: A photo showing how to perform analysis using the GPT assistant in light mode
GPTPage.altDark2: A photo showing how to perform analysis using the GPT assistant in dark mode
GPTPage.altLight3: A photo showing how to configure the GPT assistant in light mode
GPTPage.altDark3: A photo showing how to configure the GPT assistant in dark mode

ConfigurationPage.title: Flexible Configurator
ConfigurationPage.subTitle: When it comes to optimizing and automating production processes, flexibility and intuitiveness in configuring the control system play a crucial role. Our innovative system offers a simple and transparent method for configuring the structure of the machinery park, based on an intuitive tree model. This method allows for efficient organization and management of machines and production lines, providing the necessary flexibility and adaptation to the specific needs of the enterprise.
ConfigurationPage.heading1: Intuitive Configuration of the Machinery Park
ConfigurationPage.p1: Let's start from the basics - our system allows for creating the structure of the machinery park using a user-friendly interface, which presents machines and workstations in the form of a clear tree. This configuration includes various levels: from the general machinery park, through production lines, to specific machines and workstations. This makes managing even the most complex production systems intuitive and effective.
ConfigurationPage.heading2: Flexible Assignment of Statuses and Measurements
ConfigurationPage.p2: A key element of our system is the ability to assign specific statuses or measurements to each machine or workstation, which is done by adding so-called tags. These tags are acquired during the programming of controllers, gateways, or panels and serve as a bridge between the physical device and the management system. It is important that these devices are compatible with the Mqtt Sparkplug B protocol, which ensures smooth communication with the system broker.
ConfigurationPage.p3: We understand that not all devices may natively support the Mqtt Sparkplug B protocol. For such cases, we provide special communication gateways that convert signals to a compatible format. These versatile gateways support over 300 different protocols, from popular ones like OPC UA, MQTT, Ethernet, to lesser-known ones - ensuring that almost any device can be integrated with our system.
ConfigurationPage.p4: Each status assigned to a machine or workstation can be fully personalized, allowing for the customization of how information is presented to the user's needs and preferences. Colors, font sizes, icons, and even the way data is presented can be changed - for example, pressure measurement can be displayed in the form of a gauge. This flexibility greatly facilitates monitoring of production processes and quick response to any abnormalities.
ConfigurationPage.altTree: A photo depicting the structure of the machinery park in a tree view
ConfigurationPage.altLight1: A photo depicting machine editing and its statuses in light mode
ConfigurationPage.altDark1: A photo depicting machine editing and its statuses in dark mode
ConfigurationPage.altLight2: A photo depicting profile editing in light mode
ConfigurationPage.altDark2: A photo depicting profile editing in dark mode

DashboardPage.title: Interactive Dashboards for Data Exploration and Visualization
DashboardPage.p1: A key microservice that enriches the functionality of our system is interactive dashboards, which we can easily customize to individual user needs. How does it work?
DashboardPage.p2: The system utilizes the Redash tool to create dynamic charts. Redash uses the Omnimes system API to retrieve necessary data from selected machine/machines for a specified period, enabling monitoring of their changes, such as compiling downtime of the last 24 hours for several production lines, or performing comparisons, like the ratio of failure occurrences to the time of producing good products.
DashboardPage.p3: Each of these visualizations allows for individual adjustment of data refresh frequency, ranging from 1 minute to 60 minutes. Additionally, this tool offers the ability to set email alerts when a specified value exceeds a set limit.
DashboardPage.p4: The tool has been integrated with Omnimes system users, offering a unique monitoring mode. This monitoring mode differs from real-time monitoring because it allows presenting data from a wider period - up to 24 hours or 10,000 documents per visualization, meaning that the data refresh time can be up to 1 minute.
DashboardPage.p5: The visualizations offer a wide range of customization - from bar charts, through donut-type pie charts, to tables with data search capabilities. With these options, each data presentation can be maximally tailored to the user's preferences, providing precise and intuitive tools for analysis and monitoring.
DashboardPage.altRedash: A photo depicting interactive dashboards for data exploration and visualization
DashboardPage.altRedashAdding: A photo depicting the addition of charts to the dynamic dashboard

PlanogramPage.title: Production Process Visualizer
PlanogramPage.subTitle: Modern MES (Manufacturing Execution Systems) are invaluable tools in the hands of production managers, offering not only a comprehensive insight into current processes but also enabling efficient management of the machinery park. One of the key elements of modern MES systems is the planogram.
PlanogramPage.p1: In an MES system, the planogram is not just a graphical representation of the spatial layout of the machinery park, but above all, an interactive map that allows for intuitive placement and visualization of machines and workstations in tile form. Each of these tiles corresponds to a specific machine or workstation, presenting key information about their real-time status. This allows system users to assess the operational situation of the entire machinery park at a glance, providing an effective alternative to traditional monitoring.
PlanogramPage.p2: The planogram increases production management efficiency by enabling quick identification of machines operating at optimal performance, as well as those requiring intervention or maintenance. With the graphical representation of machine placement, it is also possible to easily plan changes in the production line configuration or optimize workflow without the need for physical movement around the production floor.
PlanogramPage.p3: Each element representing a machine - its status on the planogram is updated in real-time, providing information about current status, performance, as well as potential issues or failures.
PlanogramPage.p4: The planogram is highly flexible, allowing for customization and adaptation to the unique needs of each enterprise. Users can customize the appearance of tiles, the information displayed on them, and their organization to best suit the characteristics and requirements of a specific production line.
PlanogramPage.altLight: A photo depicting the Planogram module, which is a visualizer of production processes in light mode
PlanogramPage.altDark: A photo depicting the Planogram module, which is a visualizer of production processes in dark mode

HistoryPage.title: Event History
HistoryPage.subTitle: Our system is not just a set of data, it's the history of your machinery park, reflecting the pulse of your enterprise.
HistoryPage.heading1: Integrity and Transparency in One Place
HistoryPage.p1: You can track every move, every operation, every machine state to give you a complete picture of your production line's operation. Our solution presents historical data in an intuitive and accessible way, providing the continuity and transparency necessary for optimizing production processes.
HistoryPage.p2: Utilizing the power of non-relational databases combined with proprietary partitioning, Omnimes creates a new collection in the database when the data weight exceeds 100 MB, ensuring lightning-fast retrieval and loading of data by system users. This not only means increased efficiency but also ensures seamless access to information whenever it's needed.
HistoryPage.heading3: Big Data and Apache Spark â€“ AI Driving Force
HistoryPage.p3: For data reaching petabytes, we offer support through renowned Apache Spark software, ensuring that our MES system can scale with your enterprise's needs. If your company desires to delve into the world of Big Data, Omnimes is prepared to adapt to and handle data on an unprecedented scale. In this era of data, Big Data is not just a trend - it's the foundation of AI solutions driving innovation and efficiency.
HistoryPage.p4: But that's not all. Event history in our MES system is further supported by GPT Assistant analysis - artificial intelligence from OpenAI. The GPT Assistant processes collected data and provides insightful analyses that enable informed operational decision-making.
HistoryPage.altLight: A photo depicting the Event History module in light mode
HistoryPage.altDark: A photo depicting the Event History module in dark mode

SchedulePage.title: Production Schedule - Your Central Order Management Hub
SchedulePage.subTitle: Manage your production orders with unprecedented ease through the production schedule in the Omnimes system. The schedule is more than just a tool - it's a central place where current orders are not only displayed but also supervised with precision and thoroughness.
SchedulePage.l1: Daily - start each day with a clear picture of today's tasks.
SchedulePage.l2: Weekly - scroll through the week to coordinate teamwork and resources.
SchedulePage.l3: Monthly - gain perspective on upcoming weeks and adjust priorities.
SchedulePage.l4: Yearly - plan long-term with a full visualization of upcoming projects.
SchedulePage.l5: List - switch to list view for a detailed review and management of orders.
SchedulePage.p1: Plan your production with precision, using easily customizable views and filters that help you focus on the most important details and priorities.
SchedulePage.p2: With the Omnimes system, scheduling becomes proactive, not reactive. Anticipate needs, react to changes, and optimize production processes, all from one central place that is always available to you and your team.
SchedulePage.altLight: A photo depicting the production schedule in light mode
SchedulePage.altDark: A photo depicting the production schedule in dark mode

AnalysisPage.title: Analysis Modules
AnalysisPage.subTitle: Our analysis module in the MES system is the key to unlocking the full potential of your production data. We present a set of tools that not only gather data but transform it into readable and practical graphical information. We break down the complexity of data, transforming it into visual simplicity, enabling quick understanding and action.
AnalysisPage.heading1: Data Transparency from Overview to Detail
AnalysisPage.p1: The modules are designed to offer analysis from the most general indicators to specific details. The analysis modules in the Omnimes system are divided as follows:
AnalysisPage.l1-p: Failures, Downtime, and Micro Downtime - capture every moment of inactivity on your production line. These indicators provide information on the frequency of various events and their time distribution, as well as indicate total machine utilization, enhancing machinery park management efficiency.
AnalysisPage.l1-p2: Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE) - integrating data from production orders allows for creating a holistic view of operational efficiency, comprising every factor needed to calculate OEE, offering a complete view of your process performance.
AnalysisPage.l2-p: Utilities - this category includes analysis of measurements from devices such as temperature, pressure, instantaneous and total media consumption, etc., providing detailed insight into resource utilization.
AnalysisPage.l2-p2: Device Errors - while these data do not directly impact the production process, they are invaluable for service and maintenance teams. Supported by Pareto charts, these analyses reveal common causes of problems, allowing for preventive maintenance actions.
AnalysisPage.l3-p: GPT Assistant - finally, we present a list of text analyses generated by the GPT Assistant, which, using AI, delves deeper into data, offering interpretations and recommendations that can revolutionize decision-making in your company.
AnalysisPage.altLight: A photo depicting a time analysis, the chart includes information such as breakdowns, setups, and micro-stoppages. All in light mode.
AnalysisPage.altDark: A photo depicting a time analysis, the chart includes information such as breakdowns, setups, and micro-stoppages. All in dark mode.
AnalysisPage.altLight1: A photo depicting OEE analysis. All in light mode.
AnalysisPage.altDark1: A photo depicting OEE analysis. All in dark mode.
AnalysisPage.altLight2: A photo depicting media analysis. All in light mode.
AnalysisPage.altDark2: A photo depicting media analysis. All in dark mode.
AnalysisPage.altLight3: A photo depicting error analysis. All in light mode.
AnalysisPage.altDark3: A photo depicting error analysis. All in dark mode.
AnalysisPage.altLight4: A photo depicting a list of GPT assistant analyses. All in light mode.
AnalysisPage.altDark4: A photo depicting a list of GPT assistant analyses. All in dark mode.

CreatorPage.title: Report Creator
CreatorPage.subTitle: Omnimes is more than a system â€“ it's a tool that provides the flexibility your company needs to accurately analyze and optimize production processes. We believe in full customization, so our solution allows you to create your own personalized reports tailored to the specific needs of each enterprise.
CreatorPage.p1: We have divided reports into two types: Fixed reports and Flexible user template-based reports.
CreatorPage.p2: Our fixed reports, our basic reports, provide a solid foundation for key efficiency indicators such as OEE, MTTR, MTTF, or MTBF. They are automatically generated, requiring the user only to enter two values: the number of defective pieces and the number of ordered pieces.
CreatorPage.p3: Such reports are also used in work orders, where if the company decides to use the order and schedule module of the Omnimes system, it can obtain results of work at each shift change, providing us with a powerful OEE analysis chart showing how the efficiency of the production process shaped during a given shift or period of time.
CreatorPage.p4: Understanding that every company is unique, we have created template-based reports. They allow for complete control over the appearance and content of reports. Whether it's through multiple uses of one template or modifying its components, we provide a tool that evolves with your company.
CreatorPage.l1: Your company's image: Customize reports to match your company's visual identity, including the logo and small details that matter.
CreatorPage.l2: Custom formulas: Every company is different, so we offer the ability to create custom calculation formulas â€“ even for standard indicators like OEE.
CreatorPage.l3: Flexibility in usage: Use, modify, and customize report templates to meet current needs and changing business conditions.
CreatorPage.p5: With Omnimes, you gain not only a tool for creating reports â€“ you gain a partner who helps you fully understand and utilize production data. Harness the power of personalization and precision in reporting to outpace the competition and streamline your production processes. Omnimes â€“ where flexibility meets innovation.
CreatorPage.altLight: A photo depicting the report generation module in light mode.
CreatorPage.altDark: A photo depicting the report generation module in dark mode.
CreatorPage.altLight1: A photo depicting a list of templates for report generation in light mode.
CreatorPage.altDark1: A photo depicting a list of templates for report generation in dark mode.

AdministrationPage.title: User Management Module
AdministrationPage.heading1: User and Permission Management in Omnimes â€“ Full Control and Security of Your Data
AdministrationPage.p1: Our Omnimes system is designed to provide you with the highest level of flexibility and security through advanced user and permission management. We offer powerful tools that allow you to customize the system to the needs of any organization, regardless of its size or industry.
AdministrationPage.p2: Creating users in Omnimes is intuitive and fast. It allows administrators to easily add new team members, which is crucial for dynamically growing companies. Each user can be assigned to one or more groups, facilitating easy coordination of teamwork and access to the appropriate resources.
AdministrationPage.p3: Establish a clear organizational structure with user groups. Groups allow for collective management of access and permissions, significantly simplifying the administration of large teams and ensuring that each individual has access only to the resources they need for their work.
AdministrationPage.altLight: A photo depicting the user management module in the system. In light mode.
AdministrationPage.altDark: A photo depicting the user management module in the system. In dark mode.

InstallationPage.title: Fast System Installation via Docker Containerization on Any Operating System
InstallationPage.heading1: Omnimes System Installation: Speed and Universality with Docker
InstallationPage.p1: The Omnimes system is a defining modern platform that revolutionizes production management through Docker containerization. We provide lightning-fast deployment of our ecosystem, encompassing a wide range of microservices, ensuring reliability and flexibility at every step.
InstallationPage.p2: Our system consists of a set of microservices:
InstallationPage.l1: EMQX Broker: For efficient real-time message handling.
InstallationPage.l2: MongoDB Database: Providing scalable and flexible solutions for non-relational data.
InstallationPage.l3: Web Server: Delivering fast and secure access to the application.
InstallationPage.l4: Omnimes API: Enabling integration and communication between various components of the system.
InstallationPage.l5: Data Capture Service: Ensuring continuous data collection and storage to the database.
InstallationPage.l6: Redash: For intuitive and advanced data visualization.
InstallationPage.p3: We have implemented an installation process that is as simple as it gets. Regardless of the operating system â€“ whether it's Linux, Windows, or macOS â€“ you can start using Omnimes in just 5 to 10 minutes. Docker containerization ensures that all microservices are isolated, easy to configure, and ready to work in a short time, regardless of hardware specifications.
InstallationPage.p4: Docker makes our platform exceptionally universal â€“ it can be easily deployed on various devices, from dedicated servers to compact IoT devices. This flexibility makes Omnimes an excellent solution for any enterprise aiming to optimize and innovate in production.

SubscriptionPage.title: Subscription Based on License Key
SubscriptionPage.subTitle: Embark on a journey to efficiency and innovation with Omnimes, leveraging our progressive subscription structure based on a license key. Designed for flexibility and scalability, our subscription offering is tailored to the size and needs of your enterprise. See how you can benefit from choosing longer subscription periods and a greater number of machines.
SubscriptionPage.p1: The longer you stay with us, the more you save. Our progressive prices are designed to reward enterprises for long-term collaboration and future planning. Discover how increasing the number of machines and extending the subscription can positively impact your budget.
SubscriptionPage.heading2: Transparency and Access to Full Offer
SubscriptionPage.p2: Commitment to transparency is key for us â€“ all the details of our subscription plans can be found at https://www.omnimes.com/pl/oferta. Prepare your enterprise for the future with Omnimes, where innovation meets efficiency.

FAQQuestion.a1: OmniMES is an advanced production management system, integrating production processes in one integrated environment, providing comprehensive support for manufacturing.
FAQQuestion.q2: What are the main benefits of using the OmniMES system?
FAQQuestion.a2: Benefits include optimizing production efficiency, increasing product quality, reducing costs, improving tracking and control of processes, and streamlining production data management.
FAQQuestion.q3: What features does the OmniMES system offer?
FAQQuestion.a3: The OmniMES system offers a range of features, including production planning, machine status tracking, quality management, warehouse management, reporting, and production data analysis.
FAQQuestion.a4: No, the OmniMES system (Manufacturing Execution Software) is not an ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) system.
FAQQuestion.q5: Can OmniMES be integrated with ERP?
FAQQuestion.q6: Is there technical support for OmniMES system users?
FAQQuestion.a6: Yes, we offer technical support for our users, including training, online technical assistance, and telephone support.
FAQQuestion.q7: How can I start using the OmniMES system in my company?
FAQQuestion.a7: To start using the OmniMES system in your company, contact our sales team, who will be happy to provide you with all the necessary information and assist you in implementing the system.
FAQQuestion.q8: Is the OmniMES system available in the cloud?
FAQQuestion.a8: Yes, we offer the option of using the OmniMES system in a cloud model, providing easy access to data from any location and device.
FAQQuestion.q9: Is OmniMES software an on-premise or cloud-based solution?
FAQQuestion.a10: Implementation typically takes up to 5 months.
FAQQuestion.q11: Can I purchase suitable equipment with the system?
FAQQuestion.a11: OmniMes is software developed within the company Multiprojekt Automatyka, which has 20 years of experience in selecting and delivering software and components for industry. The team of technical advisors and automation specialists assists in selecting, configuring, and commissioning equipment dedicated to OmniMES.
FAQQuestion.q12: Does the OmniMES system require special equipment?
FAQQuestion.a12: The OmniMES system is flexible and can operate on various types of equipment, but we recommend choosing equipment with appropriate parameters and performance to ensure smooth operation of the system.
FAQQuestion.q13: Are there minimum hardware requirements for the OmniMES system?
FAQQuestion.a13: Yes, there are minimum hardware requirements, which depend on the size of the installation and the number of users. Our technical team will gladly provide you with detailed information on this matter.
FAQQuestion.q14: Do you offer hardware along with the implementation of the OmniMES system?
FAQQuestion.a14: Yes, we can offer a comprehensive solution, which includes not only software but also necessary hardware, depending on the individual needs and preferences of the client. Contact us for more information on this matter.
FAQQuestion.q15: What is needed to implement the OmniMES system?
FAQQuestion.a15: The first step is to conduct an interview to get an overview of the production processes in the company, followed by an examination of the technical capabilities of obtaining signals from sensors and PLCs from the machine park. After conducting the examination, the demand for OmniMES components in the hardware and implementation structure is determined.
FAQQuestion.q16: Can the system be connected to old machines?
FAQQuestion.a16: Yes, however, this requires consultation with our technical team, which includes automation specialists.
FAQQuestion.q17: Does the system allow for connecting controllers from different manufacturers?
FAQQuestion.a17: OmniMes is software developed within the company Multiprojekt Automatyka, which has 20 years of experience in selecting and delivering software and components for industry. The team of technical advisors and automation specialists assists in selecting, configuring, and commissioning equipment dedicated to OmniMES.

OmniNews.title: News
OmniNews.desc: Stay updated with the latest information and events related to OmniMES. Check out the news, innovations, and offers.
OmniNews.lackNewsDesc: No news found. Please check back later as new updates may appear.
OmniNews.lackPostsDesc: No posts found. Please check back later as new blog entries may appear.

SupportPage.title: Support Form
SupportPage.desc: Please fill out the fields below carefully so that we can help you resolve your issue as quickly and effectively as possible. Your inquiry will be forwarded to the appropriate department, and our team will contact you as soon as possible.
SupportPage.messageLabel: Describe the issue or write a message
SupportPage.messagePlaceholder: Tell us what you're writing about...
SupportPage.toastWrong: Unfortunately, the message could not be sent.
SupportPage.toastWrongDesc: Please try again or contact us directly.
SupportPage.toastSuccess: Your message has been successfully sent.
SupportPage.toastSuccessDesc: Thank you for reaching out! Our team will contact you soon.

SupportPageMeta.title: Support - Contact us if you have any issues!
SupportPageMeta.desc: Contact our support team for help resolving issues. Fill out the support form and our team will get back to you soon.
SupportPageMeta.keywords: support, help, assistance, customer service, contact, issue resolution, feature request, technical support

BecomeDeveloperPage.title: Become an OmniMes Product Developer
BecomeDeveloperPage.desc: To become an OmniMes product developer, submit a request. Fill in the necessary information in the form below.
BecomeDeveloperPage.keywords: OmniMes developer, OmniMes app, application programmer, software development, IT technology

BecomeDeveloperForm.title: Developer Form
BecomeDeveloperForm.description: Below are the necessary details for you to collaborate with us.
BecomeDeveloperForm.nameMsg: Company name should be at least 3 characters long.
BecomeDeveloperForm.nameMsg2: Company name is too long! Max 32 characters.
BecomeDeveloperForm.NipMsg: NIP must consist of digits only.
BecomeDeveloperForm.name: Name
BecomeDeveloperForm.nameMsg3: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
BecomeDeveloperForm.nameMsg5: Name cannot be longer than 32 characters.
BecomeDeveloperForm.userNotAssociated: User is not associated with any company.
BecomeDeveloperForm.successCreatePromiseToBecameDeveloper: Your request has been successfully submitted.
BecomeDeveloperForm.errorCreatePromiseToBecameDeveloper: Your request could not be submitted. Please try again later.

CompanyForm.name: Company Name
CompanyForm.title: Company Information
CompanyForm.description: Fill in the fields below to add detailed information about your company. Make sure to provide accurate data that will be used for contact and company identification.
CompanyForm.toastWrongDesc: Your name was not updated. Please try again.
CompanyForm.nameMsg: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
CompanyForm.nameMsg2: Name cannot be longer than 32 characters.
CompanyForm.descRequestPending: Your request has been sent to the company administrator. Please be patient, your application will be reviewed soon.
CompanyForm.descIfCompanyExist: Send a request for approval to the company administrator
CompanyForm.ErrorGetCompanyAfterWriteNip: Failed to retrieve company by NIP
CompanyForm.sendRequestError: Failed to send request, please try again later.
CompanyForm.errorCreatePromisesToCompany: Failed to send request, please try again later.

CompanyForm.createCompanyError: Something went wrong! Your company was not created

dashboardTable.name: Name

dashboardTable.desc: Approve or delete the request to join the company.
dashboardTable.msgErrorDeleteRequest: The request could not be deleted, please try again later.
dashboardTable.msgErrorAproveUserToCompany: The request could not be approved, please try again later.

CompanyUsersTable.title: Company Users
CompanyUsersTable.desc: The table contains information about all users in the company. Manage employees and their roles in the OmniMES system.
CompanyUsersTable.name: Name
CompanyUsersTable.msgSuccessDeleteUserFromCompany: The user has been removed from your company.
CompanyUsersTable.msgErrorDeleteUserFromCompany: Something went wrong, the user could not be removed from the company.
CompanyUsersTable.msgSuccessChangeUserRoleInCompany: The user's role in the company has been changed.
CompanyUsersTable.msgErrorChangeUserRoleInCompany: Something went wrong, the user's role in the company could not be changed.

PrivacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.privacyHeading3: III. Purpose of Personal Data Collection
PrivacyPolicy.privacyHeading4: IV. Types of Personal Data Processed
PrivacyPolicy.privacyHeading5: V. Duration of Personal Data Processing
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph1: This Privacy Policy outlines how personal data of Users, necessary for the provision of electronic services through the multiprojekt.pl website, are collected, processed, and stored.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph2: The Service collects only the personal data necessary for the provision and development of the services offered.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph3: Personal data collected through the Service are processed in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation, GDPR), and the Polish Act on the Protection of Personal Data of 10 May 2018.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph4: The Data Controller of the personal data collected through the Service is Multiprojekt Automatyka Sp. z o.o., address: ul. PilotÃ³w 2E, 31-462 KrakÃ³w, NIP: 675-144-15-70, REGON: 121401320, email address:
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph5: Personal data are used for the purpose of:
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph6: Providing data is voluntary but necessary for concluding an agreement or using other functionalities of the Service.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph7: The Controller may process the User's personal data: name, surname, address of residence, email address, phone number, NIP (Tax Identification Number).
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph8: Users' personal data will be processed for the following duration:
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph9: In both cases, the limitation period is 6 years, and for claims related to periodic services and business activities â€“ 3 years (unless a specific provision states otherwise).
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph10: Users' personal data may be shared with: entities affiliated with the Controller, its subcontractors, entities cooperating with the Controller, such as companies handling e-payments, courier/postal services, legal offices.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph11: Users' personal data will not be transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA).
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph12: The User of the Service has the right to: access their personal data, rectify it, delete it, restrict its processing, transfer it, object to processing, withdraw consent at any time (which does not affect the legality of processing based on consent before its withdrawal).
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph13: A request by the User to exercise the rights arising from the aforementioned rights should be sent to the address
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph14: The Controller shall fulfill or refuse to fulfill the request without delay â€“ within a maximum of one month of receiving it.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph15: The User has the right to file a complaint with the President of the Personal Data Protection Office if they believe that the processing violates their rights and freedoms (GDPR).
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph16: The Service collects information using cookies â€“ session, persistent, and third-party cookies.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph17: The collection of cookies supports the correct provision of services in the Service and serves statistical purposes.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph18: The User can define the scope of cookies' access to their device in the browser settings.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph19: Users' data cannot be processed in an automated manner in such a way that any decisions could be made based on it.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph20: Users' data may be profiled to customize content and personalize offers after their consent.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph21: The Controller reserves the right to make changes to the Privacy Policy, while ensuring that Users' rights are not restricted.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph22: Information about the changes will appear in the form of a notification available on the Service.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraph23: For matters not regulated by this Privacy Policy, the provisions of the GDPR and Polish law shall apply.
PrivacyPolicy.list1: account registration and user identity verification,
PrivacyPolicy.list3: performance of agreements related to services and e-services,
PrivacyPolicy.list4: communication with the User (live chat, contact form, etc.),
PrivacyPolicy.list5: sending a newsletter (after the User's consent to receive it),
PrivacyPolicy.list12: establishing and pursuing claims or defending against them.
PrivacyPolicy.list13: when the legal basis for data processing is the performance of a contract â€“ until the expiration of claims after its execution,
PrivacyPolicy.list14: when the legal basis for data processing is consent â€“ until its withdrawal, and after its withdrawal until the expiration of claims.
